Polls open in Taiwan's critical elections watched closely by ChinaPolls opened on Saturday in Taiwan's presidential and parliamentary elections which China has framed as a choice between war and peace and are happening as Beijing ramps up pressure to get the island to accept its sovereignty. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 00:06:20 GMT KNSNU4B6A5OSXG5Q63SITRAPWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/polls-open-taiwan-ritic-elections-watched-closely-by-china-2024-01-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
China urges better financing coordination for housing sectorChina's housing ministry and financial regulator asked local governments to better coordinate with financial institutions to provide financing support to real estate projects, as policymakers work to revive the sluggish housing market. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 12:40:54 GMT FAFZLMFKKRO6LPJ6TCO7PTNNHA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-urges-better-financing-coordination-housing-sector-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中国
China's 2023 bank lending at record high, but economy still strugglingNew bank lending in China rose less than expected in December, but 2023 lending hit a new record as the central bank kept policy accommodative to support an unexpectedly shaky economic recovery. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:26:26 GMT B26ZCDHZ3FKGTKLJVXURHTWL5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-2023-bank-lending-record-high-economy-still-struggling-2024-01-12/Judy Hua, Kevin Yao市场亚洲市场
In moon race with China, U.S. setbacks test role of private firmsTwo U.S. setbacks this week in the race to the moon with China illustrate the risks of NASA's plans to bet on a new strategy of relying heavily on private companies. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:08:41 GMT 2BACK DUZM5RPNVLCZLCTSE6M https://www.reuters.com/science/moon-race-with-china-us-setbacks-test-role-of-private-firms-2024-01-12/Joey Roulette, Nivedita Bhattacharjee, Ryan Woo科学
Weak demand, tighter lenders: Hong Kong property developers face tough 2024Hong Kong's property companies face a squeeze in 2024 from rising funding costs and sluggish home sales and office rentals, making creditors and investors cautious about developers’ financial health. China media warns against taking China's Indian Ocean research as threatsChinese state media warned on Friday that a report by a prominent U.S. think tank on the military uses of Chinese scientific research across the Indian Ocean gave "ammunition" to countries bent on concocting threats from China. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:51:19 GMT AOQP3UMTK5JW5DGBLJNI3RVP3E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-media-warns-against-china-take-indian-ocean-research-threats-2024-01-12/Greg Torode世界亚太地区
China-Russia 2023 trade value hits record high of $240 bln - Chinese customsChina's 2023 two-way trade with Russia hit $240 billion, setting yet another new record, Chinese customs data showed on Friday, as the two countries pushed for closer economic ties even as the war in Ukraine raged on. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:49:52 GMT 7CSHDLZYIRJMHOLUTEBHLGTOM https://www.reuters.com/markets/china- Russia-2023-trade-value-hits-record-high-240-bln-chinese-customs-2024-01-12/Reuters市场
Taiwanese pack election rallies, China vows to 'smash independence plots'Hundreds of thousands of people attended final pre-election rallies in Taiwan on Friday ahead of critical presidential and parliamentary polls, as China's defence ministry warned it would "smash any Taiwan independence plots". China's exports rise, but deflation persists as economy enters 2024 on shaky footingMore policy support seen as economy still fragile. Blinken to meet senior Chinese official ahead of Taiwan electionsU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:30:08 GMT UGZZ2HWD4RNXXHPQRCTCR5QGUY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/blinking-meet-senior-chinese-official-ahead-taiwan-elections-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan says it spotted more Chinese balloons over strait, a day ahead of voteTaiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:17:56 GMT QY3OI3K4AROYPGO5ORXEEVR23M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-it-spotted-more-chinese-balloons-over-straight-day-ahead-vote-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
